title: Must Read: Bread Beauty Supply Acquired by Topicals Founder's Holding Company, London Fashion Week Cancels June Edition
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Friday. Hair-care brand Bread Beauty Supply has been acquired by Cost of Doing Business (CODB), a holding company created by Topicals founder Olamide Olowe and Topicals President Sochima Mbadugha. Financial terms of the deal were not disclosed. ...Continue reading
author: Catie Pusateri
